Text:
Does allah condone beheadings,rape murder,torture etc etc?

Only when Islam has gone will the world find peace.
Only when all superstitious beliefs are eliminated (which also includes Christianity as well as Islam) might there be a possibility of ending a majority of conflicts.

Wow, look at all the downloaders...
durka durka wallpapers are so in demand!
oh, wait... nevermind.
Any pics form the international woman beating festival?

I really think that all religious imagery regardless of the content should not have a place on here.

Also, racism is not the way ahead on this site.

I don't believe in any of it so just let it go...

On the other hand I think the US should invade the middle east, kill everyone in the name of God and take all the oil. After all, thats what most wars are about these days isn't it? 

Funny, I doubt we will reach 2020 at this rate. One thing all of mankind has in common is that he likes to kill his fellow man regardless of colour, race or religion. As long he has enough fuel to power his car he is cool!

Leave the guy alone, and let him believe what he wants to. Nobody's forcing anyone to download this. 

You keyboard warriors ought to get your own house in order before you start chucking insults around; no religion has the moral high ground, you're all as bad as each other.
